did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: One for the Road: Recollections of a Wayfaring Scholar 1985
did.abstract: C.L. Sonnichsen was an historian, professor, author and senior editor of the Journal of Arizona History. Typescript (photocopy) autobiography by C. L. Sonnichsen. Also includes author's vitae.

repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

bioghist.p: Historian, Professor, Author, and Senior Editor of the Journal of Arizona History.
